Ising model.definition: A mathematical model used in statistical mechanics to describe ferromagnetism in materials.
lattice: d-dimensional cubic lattice with N sites in each direction
states: each site has a spin up (+1) or down (-1)
relevant_parameters: J: interaction strength between neighboring spins
temperature: $\beta = \frac{1}{k_B T}$, where $k_B$ is Boltzmann constant and T is temperature

Newtonian mechanics.definition: A classical physics framework that describes the motion of objects based on Newton's laws of motion and universal gravitation.
laws: First Law (Inertia): An object at rest stays at rest, and an object in motion stays in motion unless acted upon by a net external force.
Second Law (F=ma): The acceleration of an object is directly proportional to the net force acting on it and inversely proportional to its mass.
Third Law (Action-Reaction): For every action, there is an equal and opposite reaction.
components: time and space as absolute entities
